SEARCH
Package pacmangame.view

Class PacmanView

java.lang.Object
processing.core.PApplet
pacmangame.view.PacmanView
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPacmanView, processing.core.PConstants
public class PacmanView extends processing.core.PApplet implements IPacmanView
The view class for the Pacman game. It handles the graphical representation of the game elements and interacts with the Pacman controller.
